item.title: What the heck is Feminist Media?
item.description: We want a different system of creating representations of women, not simply different representations. -Lana Rakow We want all people of all genders to have an equal share of opportunities to tell their own stories and write their own destinies. We design participatory media processes so that women and gender-diverse individuals can voice out their own agenda. We facilitate consciousness-raising using creative media to cultivate feminist imaginations and critical thinking
